front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Preferred Ratings, Related Requirements, and Application Recommendations for Low-Voltage Ac (635V and Below) and DC (3200V and Below) Power Circuit Breakers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard defines the preferred ratings for low-voltage ac (635V and below) power circuit breakers, general purpose dc (325V and below) power circuit breakers, heavy duty lowvoltage dc (3200V and below) power circuit breakers, and fused (integrally or non-integrally) lowvoltage ac (600V and below) power circuit breakers.
